data.description: Wrapper API for AFS Administrative Commands
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module complements the XS based AFS API by providing an
    interface for several administrative commands that are not covered
    by AFS.pm and its ilk.

    Written in pure perl, with a purely OO interface, which API is the
    basis for an extensive set of production applications which are used
    to manage an Enterprise AFS Infrastructure at the authors place of
    employment, where these modules are considered production.
